copy.description: If true the receipt is a copy

service_id.description: Id created when then business is registered within findity

organization_number.description: Swedish organisationsnummer or vat reg number

contact.description: Merchant contact information name, address, phone etc

address.title: address
address.description: An address following the convention of http://microformats.org/wiki/hcard

type.title: address type
type.description: is address (physical/email) related to business, home, etc

phone.title: generic phone number
phone.description: generic format for phone numbers where strict format can not be enforced, use only for phone number to be displayed

cashier.description: Identifies the person handling the purchase if applicable
cashier.title: cashier name and id

sales_recording_system.description: Information about the point of sales system used. The system producing the receipt
sales_recording_system.title: sales recording system information

oneOf.title: point of sales system
oneOf.description: information that somehow identifies the pos system

receipt_identifier.description: Receipt identifiers: sequence number and/or extended number with or without barcode representation
receipt_identifier.title: receipt identifier

sequence_number.description: a sequence number as stipulated by the swedish tax authorities

extended_number.description: a more complex receipt number if applicable, must be unique in given context

value.description: data that will be presented as a barcode on the receipt

context.description: in what context is the value (receipt number) unique, note GLOBAL can only be used if a digital receipt provider receipt id is used

currency.description: The receipt default currency. This gives the currency for all amounts in the receipt. If applicable overriding currencies can be added to the tender parts
currency.title: ISO-4217 currency codes

totals.description: Total amounts and types, example net, gross, vat, discount

oneOf.title: Total discount amount
oneOf.description: Total discount amount presented on the receipt

allOf.title: Total amounts presented on the receipt
allOf.description: One or more totals like net amount, vat, paid, discount

refund.description: true if amount to customer, example: on return of goods

anyOf.title: Loyalty based discount
anyOf.description: Gives discount based on loyalty, connected to totals/discount

allOf.title: Common sub total properties
allOf.description: Common properties for all sub totals

refund.description: true if amount to customer, example: on return of goods

anyOf.title: Sub totals can be used on all totals if needed
anyOf.description: One or more sub totals for example one for each tax percentage

allOf.description: Common properties for all sub totals

refund.description: true if amount to customer, example: on return of goods

type.description: Can be one of the total amount types or any other description what the subtotal is about

oneOf.description: paid: gross amount including discount and rounding.

allOf.description: One or more totals like net amount, vat, paid, discount

refund.description: true if amount to customer, example: on return of goods

anyOf.title: Amount received from customer
anyOf.description: Use with total/paid if paid gives the total amount paid and the subtotal gives what is given by  customer

anyOf.title: Returned sub total
anyOf.description: Use with total/paid if paid gives the total amount paid and the subtotal gives what is returned to customer

refund.description: true if amount to customer, example: on return of goods

sub_totals.description: add sub total for each tax percentage used

collection.description: Arbitray array of strings used where additional info needed at some part

type.description: Can be one of the total amount types or any other description what the subtotal is about

header_text.description: Any textual information aimed for the receipt header

collection.description: Arbitray array of strings used where additional info needed at some part

footer_text.description: Any textual information aimed for the receipt footer

collection.description: Arbitray array of strings used where additional info needed at some part

items.description: List of receipt items, goods or services sold/returned

oneOf.description: Defines data needed to handle sold product/service

allOf.description: Item sold by the merchant

allOf.title: Item definition
allOf.description: Item and/or service description

items.title: Item identifier
items.description: A list of supported identifier types, pos: Point of Sales, srs: Sales Recording System

eligible_for_frequent_shopper_points.description: true if item bought is eligible for bonus

allOf.title: Common item properties
allOf.description: Common item properties for ordering and navigation

sequence_number.description: All items must have a unique sequence number 1,2,3 etc. Used for internal references. Also see item_link

item_link.description: A reference to an other items sequence_number if a relation exists

collection.description: Arbitray array of strings used where additional info needed at some part

unit_cost_price.description: The unit cost of the item to the mechant at the time of the Transaction.

regular_sales_unit_price.description: The per-unit price for the item/service before any discounts or surcharges have been applied.

extended_gross_amount.description: The amount this item sells for excluding discounts. It is the regular_sales_unit_price times the quantity

actual_sales_unit_price.description: The amount a single item sold for taking into account discounts and surcharges. The amount charged the customer (extended_amount) takes into account this number times quantity

extended_amount.description: The actual amount this item sells for. It is the actual_sales_unit_price times the quantity taking into account any retail price modifiers

items.title: Retail price modifier
items.description: Specifies any modifier to a service/item price on a specific line item, e.g. discount, deposit

action.description: Tells whether to add, subtract or replace the modifier to/from he sales amount.

unit_amount.description: The unit refund for the modifier.

amount.description: Total modifier amount, that is unit_amount * quantity

quantity.description: How many times is the modifier used. Might no be the same as number of items/services bought. Example: 2 coupons '3 for 2' on six items. Item quantity == 6, modifier quantity == 2

collection.description: Arbitray array of strings used where additional info needed at some part

tax_percentage.description: If the modifier has another tax percentage than the item/service amount it affects

extended_discount_amount.description: The total discount applied to this item

tax_amount.description: tax amount based on extended amount and tex percentage

foreign_currency.title: Foreign currency
foreign_currency.description: Gives exchange rate etc when payment is done with a foreign currency

original_face_amount.description: the original amount in the foreign currency the being converted to local currency.  For example, converting Yen to Dollars, this amount would be the amount of Yen

oneOf.description: Amount in loyalty program points

points.description: cost for goods/service as number of loyalty points

oneOf.description: Defines data needed to handle returned product/service

allOf.description: Item returned to the merchant

receipt_reference.description: a more complex receipt number if applicable, must be unique in given context

value.description: data that will be presented as a barcode on the receipt

context.description: in what context is the value (receipt number) unique, note GLOBAL can only be used if a digital receipt provider receipt id is used

sequence_number.description: All items must have a unique sequence number 1,2,3 etc. Used for internal references. Also see item_link

item_link.description: A reference to an other items sequence_number if a relation exists

collection.description: Arbitray array of strings used where additional info needed at some part

oneOf.description: Deposit to get or pay connected to items sold/returned

unit_amount.description: The unit cost/refund for goods/service deposit.

amount.description: Total cost/refund for goods/service deposit, unit_amount * quantity

quantity.description: Number of times deposit is applied

refund.description: True if amount goes to customer, false otherwise

tax_percentage.description: Tax on deposit is not always the same as the goods/service connected

items.title: VAT sub deposit
items.description: A desposit can be devided into different VATs

refund.description: true if amount to customer, a deposit return

allOf.description: Common item properties for ordering and navigation

sequence_number.description: All items must have a unique sequence number 1,2,3 etc. Used for internal references. Also see item_link

item_link.description: A reference to an other items sequence_number if a relation exists

collection.description: Arbitray array of strings used where additional info needed at some part

retail_price_modifiers.description: Specifies any modifier(s) related to the amount paid by the customer. Example: 5% discount on the total amount

items.title: Retail price modifier
items.description: Specifies any modifier to a service/item price on a more general receipt level or connected to a specific item/service

item_links.description: Reference to sale/return item sequence_number if applicable

allOf.title: Retail price modifier
allOf.description: Specifies any modifier to a service/item price on a specific line item, e.g. discount, deposit

action.description: Tells whether to add, subtract or replace the modifier to/from he sales amount.

unit_amount.description: The unit refund for the modifier.

amount.description: Total modifier amount, that is unit_amount * quantity

quantity.description: How many times is the modifier used. Might no be the same as number of items/services bought. Example: 2 coupons '3 for 2' on six items. Item quantity == 6, modifier quantity == 2

collection.description: Arbitray array of strings used where additional info needed at some part

tax_percentage.description: If the modifier has another tax percentage than the item/service amount it affects

payments.description: Tender related information, several tender types can be used for payment

items.title: Payment information
items.description: One or more tender types can be used. Each type is described and the amount used for each tender type

amount_applied_to_bill.description: the amount applied to the transaction total

foreign_currency_amount.description: Gives exchange rate etc when payment is done with a foreign currency
foreign_currency_amount.title: Foreign currency

original_face_amount.description: the original amount in the foreign currency the being converted to local currency.  For example, converting Yen to Dollars, this amount would be the amount of Yen

rounding.description: If the amount to pay needs rounding

refund.description: True if customer is given a refund or change

tender.description: Gives the payment/tender type used and payment/tender specific information

oneOf.title: Cash payment
oneOf.description: Cash payment

oneOf.title: Credit or Debit Card Tender
oneOf.description: Credit or debit card payment properties

bank_identification_number.description: ISO 8583 field 56 Payment Account Reference, masked card number

card_acceptor_terminal_id.description: ISO 8583 field 41 Card Acceptor Terminal ID

merchant_identifier.description: ISO 8583 field 42 Card Acceptor Identification Code

card_token.description: Gives a token value of the payment card and tokenizier info/scheme.
card_token.title: Tokenized payment card

scheme.description: Token scheme, vendor specific. Any unique token provider definition, e.g. payprov_name_findity_dr

payment_slip.description: Payment slip data as an array of texts

collection.description: Arbitray array of strings used where additional info needed at some part

oneOf.title: Giftcard payment type
oneOf.description: Gives giftcard payment info: amount (initial, current), valid period, etc. Dates must be given in format: 2016-09-29

oneOf.title: Generic mobile payment type
oneOf.description: Gives basic mobile payment information, mobile specific payment info can be added in the tender_details section

provider.description: Mobile payment name, e.g. swish, android wallet, etc

phone.title: phone number identifer
phone.description: more restrictive international phone number format used as identifier, based on ITU-T E.123

allOf.description: Generic text collection type used where additional text is needed in a structured (key/value) or unstructured way

collection.description: Arbitray array of strings used where additional info needed at some part

oneOf.description: Add any key-value pair (string based properties) to this collection

oneOf.title: Loyalty payment
oneOf.description: Loyalty payment, bonus check

points_redeemed.description: The number of loyalty points redeemed by the customer

amount_redeemed.description: The amount redeemed by the customer

loyalty_program.description: Add loyalty account data to the customer defintions

oneOf.title: Coupon payment
oneOf.description: Coupon payment

description.description: Any additional coupon description, if needed

family_code.description: Assigned by the manufacture for each product, validates that a consumer has purchased a qualifying product

quantity.description: Quantity of items covered by the coupon

item_links.description: Links to sold item sequence numbers part of promotion is applicable

oneOf.title: Generic payment type
oneOf.description: Generic tendertype. Use other+type_name if no other payment type matches. Add tender specific payment in the details section

collection.description: Arbitray array of strings used where additional info needed at some part

The customer phone number

level.description: Some programs has different levels based on point etc

target_count.description: Loyalty points needed to achieve next goal/level

level.description: Some programs has different levels based on point etc

order_number.description: Order/booking number connected to receipt on new order/booking
